name: Istanbul Best Budget Smart Tour 2
description: You will have make a Ferry Trip along the Sea- You will See over 50 most visited buildings from outside, you can also feed seagulls which will I show how to do .Palace, Bosphorıus Bridge ,the Ftah Sultan Mehmet Bridge, the 3 Th.Bridge connecting Asia and Eurpean side . Pick up from Hotel or Hagia Sophia Church at center. in the morning
